commit.message:
parse.y (end_artificial_method_body): Fixed undefined behavior.

2000-12-15  Alexandre Petit-Bianco  <apbianco@cygnus.com>

	* parse.y (end_artificial_method_body): Fixed undefined behavior.
	Credits go to rth for finding it.

(http://gcc.gnu.org/ml/gcc/2000-12/msg00495.html)

From-SVN: r38278
